data.name: position
data.description: Controls where the tooltip appears relative to the trigger element.

data.name: triggerEvent
data.description: Determines how the tooltip is triggered, either on hover or click.

data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Sets the animation speed for showing and hiding the tooltip.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Defines the border-radius of the tooltip for corner styling.

data.name: gap
data.description: Specifies the spacing between the tooltip and the trigger element.
